item.title: Would you like to register your business or NGO In EUROPE or AFRICA ?
item.description: Would you like to register your business or NGO In EUROPE and AFRICA make it have an INTERNATIONAL presence ? go Global quickly and...
item.dc:creator: mwas-wix
item.content:encoded:
Would you like to register your business or NGO In EUROPE and AFRICA make it have an INTERNATIONAL presence ? go Global quickly and compliantly ?

We can help you !

1.We can register it for you

2.File your annual returns

.Design a website and offer ongoing IT support

4.Offer social media support

5.Draft a constitution for you

6.Edit your work

7.Offer admin support (proofreading, editing and content writing)

8.Networking and Marketing support

9.Write grant proposals for International organisations

10. We also edit Academic papers for University students, Professors & Authors

11. You will become an official member of our parent company , an award winning International Chamber of Commerce Europe etc etc

For more information please contact us @

My World Admin Services

(MWAS International)

www.myworldadminservices.com

Mob/WhatsApp

+353 89 4616871

+255 713 571992

Email

info@myworldadminservices.com

Website

www.myworldadminservices.com

Social Media

Instagram Facebook & Twitter

Thank you very much

*********************************************************************

IN SWAHILi

JE ! unataka kusajili biashara au NGO yako *Ulaya* ili iwe ya KIMATAIFA zaidi?

*Wasiliana nasi tukusaidie na kwa bei nafuu kabisa.

1.Tutasajili biashara au Charity yako Ulaya

2.Tutakusaidia kufanya Annual returns, 3. Tutahariri kazi zako,

4. Kuandika maombi ya pesa kwa nashirika ya kimataifa,

5.Kutengeza website kwa bei nafuu,

6.Kuhariri kazi za wanafunzi wa chuo, walimu na maandishi wa vitabu,

7. Kutoa support ya mitandao ya kijamii, 8. Kukuandikia katiba,

9.Utakuwa official member wa kampuni yetu mama ambayo ni Taasisi ya kibiashara ya kimataifa Ulaya na Marekani

10 Kukutangazia biashara yako kwenye Events

11. Huduma za IT n.k n.k

Kwa taarifa zaidi kuhusu huduma zetu, wasiliana nasi kupitia contact details hapa chini My World Admin Services (MWAS International) www.myworldadminservices.com Mob/WhatsApp +353 89 4616871 +255 713 571992 Email info@myworldadminservices.com Website www.myworldadminservices.com Social Media Instagram Facebook & Twitter Ahsanteni sana

item.title: "Stereotyping is wrong and can create an inferiority complex and fear in people"
item.description: DCU - Dublin City University Mrs Edna Lyatuu Hogan Founder and CEO of 'Jifunze' Education Programme that is run under her business MWAS...
item.dc:creator: mwas-wix
item.content:encoded:
DCU - Dublin City University

Mrs Edna Lyatuu Hogan Founder and CEO of 'Jifunze' Education Programme that is run under her business MWAS (MY World Admin Services) presenting a paper today on Intercultural Education in Ireland. Edna said "Stereotyping is wrong and can create an inferiority complex and fear in people'.

She concluded her presentation by citing a poem called 'The wonder of biology' from her latest Poetry book. The poem underlined the importance of love and tolerance of other peoples' cultures for a harmony society.

'Poems for the Soul and the BOLD minds' is available to buy on Amazon at this linkÂ http://mybook.to/LyatuuPoems
